pages.text: (Yosef) kaa sε: “Onyame mpa nngu sε yεbεfa obi foforͻ a εnyε nea yehunuu y’adeε no wͻ nehͻ. (Sε yεyε saa a) nokorε sε na y’ayε abͻnefoͻ

Ԑberε a wͻn abamu buu wͻ neho no, wͻ’kͻtuu agyina wͻ kokoam. Wͻn mu panin no kaa sε: “Monim sε mode Nyankopͻn din mu adi nse akyerε mopapa, εna modii kan buu moani guu deε na εsεsε moyε ma Yosef soͻ? Enti mennfri asaase yi so kͻpem sε m’agya bεma me ho kwan ansa, anaasε Onyankopͻn bedi (m’asεm) ama me, na Ɔne atemmufoͻ no nyinaa mu Otemmufoᴐ papa paa no
(Enti) monsan nkͻ moagya hͻ na monkͻka nkyerε no sε: “Y’agya, nokorε sε woba (Benyamin) abͻ korͻno, na deε yenim na yedi ho adanseε; na deε asuma no deε yanntumi ammͻ ho ban “
Bisa kuro (Misrim) a na yε’wͻ mu no ne akwantufoͻ a yεne wͻn baeε no (na hunu sε), ampa sε nokorε na yεreka no“
(Ya’quub) kaa sε: “Daabi, mo ara moadwen na mode ayε kanana, nanso aboterε na εyε. Ebia Nyankopͻn de wͻn nyinaa (Yuusuf, Benyamin ne Rubel) bεbrε me. Nokorε sε, Ɔne Onimdefoͻ no, Ɔne Onyansafoͻ no
(Ya’aquub) danee neho frii wͻn ho kaa sε: “Ao, mewerεho a aho wͻ Yosef ho, na awerεhoͻ maa (nisuo taataa no) maa n’ani yεε fitaa, εnam awerεhoͻ nhyεsoͻ nti
(Ne mma no) kaa sε: “Onyankopͻn! enti (agya), wonnyae Yosef ho adwendwen kosi sε εbεbͻ wo yadeε, anaa kͻpem sε wobewuo?”
Ɔkaa sε: ”Onyankopͻn na mede m’akosεm ne m’awerεhoͻ to N’anim, na menim adeε a monnim wͻ Nyankopͻn hͻ.”
